front.title: ESMTP Service Extension for Filtering Gateways

abstract.t: This document describes a needed extenson to the STD-10SMTP (Simple Mail Transport Protocol) service so that anESMTP server and client mqy delay specific recipientacceptance until after content can be examined by thefiltering gateway. It adds one return code (355) andthree verbs (ADAT, DRCP and ERCP) to the ESMTP protocolas defined in RFC2821.
